title: Daydream
story: At first light, the city wakes to a cold stone wall reborn as a canvas of dreams. Rainbow flowers, painted in lively strokes, lure onlookers into a world filled with enchanting colour.

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 4.0 x 4.0 inches or 10.2 x 10.2 cm on 14 count aida
